description: Smoked salmon and salmon trimmings work well for this recipe.
name: Smoked Salmon Pâté Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 200g smoked salmon trimmings, very finely chopped
0.5 lemon, finely grated zest and juice

recipeInstructions.text: Place the cream cheese in a mixing bowl and break it up with a fork until smooth. Stir in the salmon, lemon zest and juice, chives, and plenty of pepper.
Transfer to a serving dish, cover with cling film, and chill until ready to serve.
Spread the pâté on oatcakes and serve with the cucumber.
